From 23 January 2017 until June 2017, Trustee of

democratic values worldwide.

Private
Employment
£214,933
From 14 October 2016, weekly newspaper column, and
other articles on request, for The Times. Expected
remuneration of £150,000 a year from News UK, 1
London Bridge Street, London SE1 9GF, in return
for an average of 8 hrs per week. This contract is
for twelve months. I consulted ACoBA about this
appointment.
